title: New target for chronic pain relief confirmed by scientists

title_detail.value: New target for chronic pain relief confirmed by scientists

summary: A research group has observed a potential new target for chronic pain treatment. Further research using this receptor could lead to new, more effective drugs to use in pain-relieving treatment for chronic pain.

summary_detail.value: A research group has observed a potential new target for chronic pain treatment. Further research using this receptor could lead to new, more effective drugs to use in pain-relieving treatment for chronic pain.
